answerText: determinant[10] This is the determinant of the matrix of a non-invertible transformation.

subject: Science
question: Question: This operation is applied to the Wronskian to determine linear independence of solutions to differential equations. [10] Name this alternating multilinear function that is usually indicated by putting straight bars on either side of a matrix.
